duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct methodical evaluation of system capabilities relative to business needs and translate them into actionable technical specifications for the software development team.
Identify and assess technology solutions with an understanding of both technical and operational dependencies.
Coordinate and participate in User Acceptance Testing (UAT) and analyze/validate complex data sets using SQL.
Serve as a subject matter expert, providing timely, pertinent information to other members of the squad and/or business partners.
Develop artifacts that support efficient and effective solution delivery, such as user stories, process maps/workflows, and system diagrams.
Identify and respond to production incidents/issues – validation, scope, impact, urgency, guiding key integration decisions and driving solutions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (Master's preferred)
